name: Pipe Panic (Ben James)
description:
Roving green blobs are running amok in the steam plant!

You are an emergency plumber whose task is to shut off all the leaking steam valves in the plant. 

You have the magical ability to transform into a ghostly form, become untouchable and float through walls - but only for a short time! Use your ghost form sparingly.

Made for MiniJam 102: Steam
